lead_paragraph: The Memphis freshman Derrick Rose announced he was jumping to the N.B.A., the same day Coach John Calipari agreed in principle to a contract extension with the university. Terms of Calipari’s deal have not been completed.
snippet: The Memphis freshman Derrick Rose announced he was jumping to the N.B.A., the same day Coach John Calipari agreed in principle to a contract extension with the university. Terms of Calipari’s deal have not been completed.
